contents: Article 36 (Establishment of Budget) ① The Chairman of the Board must prepare a budget plan, pass a resolution by the Board of Directors, and obtain approval from the Minister of Health and Welfare. The budget is established upon receiving a notification of budget approval. Revised 2008. 4. 2., 2010. 3. 30., ② When receiving the budget approval notification pursuant to paragraph 1, the budget manager shall notify the sectoral budget manager without delay of the sectoral budget. ③ The established budget shall be The details must be reported to the Minister of Strategy and Finance and the Board of Audit and Inspection without delay.
